FieldDefinition.description: input used in this mashup to determine the connection type
FieldDefinition.name: inputConnectionType

FieldDefinition.description: input boolean which will disable the remember selection in the session
FieldDefinition.name: inputDisablePreserveSelectionInSession

FieldDefinition.description: boolean that determines if you should preserve the select row in the tree structure grid.
FieldDefinition.name: inputEnablePreserveTreeStructureNode

FieldDefinition.description: input infotable containing the rows that should be selected on the tag grid.
FieldDefinition.name: inputSelectedRowsForTagStructure

FieldDefinition.description: input infotable containing the rows that should be selected on the tree structure grid.
FieldDefinition.name: inputSelectedRowsForTreeStructure

FieldDefinition.description: items that you would want to be filtered after selecting a type.
FieldDefinition.name: inputSourceFilter

FieldDefinition.description: allows external control of weather you should see single or multiple select for a tree grid
FieldDefinition.name: setToSingleSelect
